'''Special Commemorative Letter''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after completing at least one of each tribe's Tune-up Goals during the [[Emblem of Steadfast Valor]] event, if the player has not completed {{Quest|Incandescent Ode of Resurrection}}. Prior to completion of Incandescent Ode of Resurrection, attempting to use this item displays the following message: ''Complete the Archon Quest "Incandescent Ode of Resurrection" to use''.

Upon completion of ''Incandescent Ode of Resurrection'' the item may be used to obtain [[Emblem of Valor]].
